00001 #script to optimize the crystal structure of (NH2)2CO (urea)
00002 from sample.Sample import Sample
00003 from molDynamics.gulp.forcefields.AluminaForcefield import AluminaForcefield  
00004 from applications.MdApp import MdApp
00005 from UnitCell import UnitCell
00006 # set up the sample with atoms, periodicity, atomic interactions
00007 sample = Sample() 
00008 unitCell = UnitCell()
00009 unitCell.i.a = '2.380100 1.374151 4.331100'
00010 unitCell.i.b = '-2.380100 1.374151 4.331100'
00011 unitCell.i.c = '0.000000 -2.748303 4.331100'

00027 ['H', 0.63785790, 0.86214210, -0.01940859], 
00028 ['H', 0.36214109, 0.13785891, -0.01940832]]'''
00029 sample.i.partialCharges = "{'C':0.380000, 'O':-0.380000, 'N':-0.830000, 'H':0.415000}"
00030 sample.i.initialTemp = 300.0
00031 sample.i.forcefield = AluminaForcefield()
00032     
00033 # invoke the application and set its inventory
00034 app = MdApp()
00035 g = app.i.mdEngine
00036 g.i.sample = sample
00037 g.i.runType = 'optimize'
00038 g.i.coordinateFormat = 'fractional'
00039 g.i.optimizeCoordinates = True
00040 g.i.optimizeCell = True
00041 g.i.constantPressureOptimize = True
00042 g.i.dispersionInRecipSpace = True
00043 g.i.computeMaterialProperties = True
00044 g.i.identifyMolecules = True
00045 g.i.engineExecutablePath = '/home/brandon/gulp3.0/practice/gulp'
00046 g.i.inputDeck = 'ureaOpt.gin'
00047 g.i.trajectoryFilename = 'ureaOpt.xyz'
00048 g.i.logFilename = 'ureaOpt.log'
00049 app.run()
